name: Courtyard by Marriott Los Angeles Torrance/South Bay

reviews.text: You know exactly what to expect when you go to a Courtyard and this visit was no better or worse than the typical Courtyard experience. Friendly greeting upon arrival, quick check-in, typical room. No complaints, would stay again.
reviews.title: Solid Courtyard experience

reviews.text: One of the things I love about Marriott properties is that, for the most part, you know what to expect. A professional staff, well kept property, comfortable bed, clean room are all things we look forward to. This property is no exception. We enjoyed our stay and found no surprises.
reviews.title: Very Marriott

reviews.text: The pool looked lovely. We had too little time to enjoy it. There are electric outlets everywhere. The bed was soft and everything we needed was right there.
reviews.title: never stay again

reviews.text: I requested a high floor, and quiet room because I was staying with an infant. But the room they assigned was on the ground floor and fasing a parking and freeway. The room rate was too high to meet my expectation. It was not so bad but I will never stay again.
reviews.title: Woke up with termites in my bed!

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Los Angeles Torrance/South Bay Hotel Torrance
